content: with mother s day just around the corner i wanted to design something special with a mother s love in mind the for mom sock does just that we start with a provisional cast on to allow for a double-layered cuff this reminds me of my mom s really good hugs i added some seed stitches to represent all those little seeds of wisdom our moms plant in our lives and i ve chosen colors that i know my mom will love i hope you take this and make it your own and if it earns you a few extra brownie points with mom you re welcome available in 3 adult sizes
